short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Maximise your visibility. Increase your SSI by actively commenting on posts thanks to the power of AI and GPT.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Comment Booster for LinkedIn is an innovative tool designed to help you maximize your visibility and engagement on LinkedIn effectively and quickly. Harnessing the power of artificial intelligence and GPT, this extension generates relevant and well-crafted comments that allow you to interact more actively in posts.

Maximize Your Visibility: By actively commenting on posts, you increase your presence on LinkedIn, making you more visible to your network and beyond.

Boost Your Social Selling Index (SSI): Actively and consistently participating in LinkedIn conversations is an excellent way to improve your SSI, an index that LinkedIn uses to measure your effectiveness on the platform.

Leverage the Power of AI: Using advanced GPT technology, this extension generates informed and pertinent comments that enrich discussions and position you as a valuable participant.

Personalized and High-Quality Comments: The extension not only automates comment generation but also allows you to customize the prompt used by GPT-4, ensuring that the comments align with your style and objectives.

Save Time and Effort: Instead of dedicating significant time and effort to crafting each comment, you can rely on the extension to create quick and effective responses, allowing you to focus on other important activities.

Easy to Use: The extension's intuitive interface makes it easy to set up and use, with clear options to manage your OpenAI API Key and customize the comment generation prompt.
